title: Didnt get a second chest
body:
I just created this new account and i got 1 chest where i got an ashe skin, but i heard that i should had taken 2 chests.Am i wrong patch 7.22 on EUW MAYBE SOMEONE FROM RIOT CAN CONTACT AND GIVE A SOLUTION
name SKT Hitman

replies.body: Hey there, I looked into this and you might be right.  I've created a ticket for you so we can take a closer look and verify if anything is missing.  We'll reply back as soon as we can and have investigated further.  Your ticket number is 32655090.  Hang tight!

What shuld i do with that ticket number? Also can u add Forsaken jayce on my loot instead of my second missing chest and maybe i purchase it after disenchanting some skins in the future. 
And ty for the fast responde POROCLES

Keep an eye on your email or login to the [ticketing center](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to view your open tickets.  Sorry, we can't modify content you would receive in chests.  :P It looks like a specialist was able to reach out in the ticket and fix things up for you.  :D
THNX for the help mister specialist also wanted to know wos a problem in my account or maybe it got to other accounts too.And thnx for the help i just got the chest.
